entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening and ending before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
